name: chatwindow
description: Free Live Video Broadcast and Group Chat
overview:
Everyday we interact with many people online and offline.

The web has given us very easy ways to interact with Friends and Family – You may chat using Gmail, Facebook, Skype etc.

All existing ways to interact online with non-friends requires you to actually ADD them to your friend lists. This can be tough – You don’t want to add all your prospects into the lists. Even if you do – it is a lot of work.

There are many URLs that helps others access you and send information like your twitter URL or say LinkedIn URL where they possibly can reach out to you.

What if you could make yourself available to your clients and prospects on a URL where you’re actually available in Realtime? They should be able to just ping you without going through the process of creating accounts, downloading software or even adding you as one of their contacts.

Chatwindow Offers this unique URL where you can be reached!

Also, We look forward to connect people with mutual interests. When you’re on video – you can reach out to people who’re interested in similar stuff or has similar offerings.

Sometimes, you just are willing to be available only for Chat and not Video or Audio. Chatwindow Offers options to disable Sending Audio and Video with a simple Checkbox on the dashboard.
